data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of ITC Hotels Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from Janaury 29 2025 the equity shares of ITC Hotels Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544325) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250127-10  dated January 27 2025.
